head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SMITH, PATRICIA LEE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SMITH, PATRICIA LEE

block.p: SMITH-Patricia Lee (Weinberg). 57, on July 18, 2000 at home in Barrington, R.I. Beloved wife of Dr. Robert N. Smith. Adored mother of Dr. Michelle Smith (Manuel) Goncalves, Dr. Nicole Smith (Matthew) Steckler, Sharon Smith (Scott) Boyd and Danielle Smith. Cherised daughter of Ruth Mindlin Weinberg and the late Bertram U. Weinberg. Dearest grandmother of Alexa and Jack Steckler. Loving sister of Nancy Winston Weinberg, Max and Rebecca (Shick) Weinberg and Abby Weinberg Levin (Michael). Devoted sister-inlaw, cousin and aunt of 10. Services at 1pm Thursday, July 20th at Shalom Memorial Chapel, 1100 New London Ave, Cranston, R.I. Toll free 877-463-7771. In lieu of flowers, donations may be madeto the Gilda Radner Ovarian Cancer Registry, Roswell Park Cancer Institute, Elm and Carlton Sts, Buffalo, N.Y. 14263.
